channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Vantage SystemUpdate Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Vantage SystemUpdate Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-3701|2024-08-03T01:20:57.017Z -- lenovo -- vantage%20systemupdate%20plugin
item.description: A privilege elevation vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Vantage SystemUpdate plugin version 2.0.0.212 and earlier that could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-3700|2024-08-03T01:14:03.243Z -- lenovo -- vantage%20systemupdate%20plugin
item.description: A Time of Check Time of Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Vantage SystemUpdate Plugin version 2.0.0.212 and earlier that could allow a local attacker to delete arbitrary files.
